Title: Rick and Morty
text: Rick and Morty is an American animated sitcom made by Justin Roiland and Dan Harmon for Cartoon Networks late-night program called "Adult Swim". It's about an mad scientist called Rick Sanchez and his grandson Morty Smith. The episode's themes often change from being an family drama to an Sci-Fi action thrilled adventure. There are as of 2020 4 seasons.
